txt.en: From this outlook, you see an Easterling worksite where terrifying machines of war are being hastily constructed
Collected a drawing of a siege-weapon design ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Easterlings are designing and building siege-weapons too near Floodwend, leaving scraps of parchment with dangerous plans strewn about their encampment.

'I have heard rumours of Easterling siege-weapons being constructed not far from here. I am terribly concerned about these claims, for such weapons would spell our doom, and the doom of Floodwend.\n\n'Will you investigate nearby and search for the source of these rumours?'
The rumours of an Easterling Woodyard point to the north-east of North-torr.\n\nYou should locate this Woodyard and see what can be seen.
You have collected many siege-weapon designs to be shown later to Sergeant Guthferth.
The Woodyard is north-east of North-torr.\n\nYou should steal siege-weapon designs from the Woodyard.
You have collected many siege-weapon designs to be shown later to Sergeant Guthferth.
Find the source of the rumour of Easterling siege-weapons
